alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kohala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 19 at 8:51AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR MOLOKAI MAUI LANAI KAHOOLAWE AND THE BIG ISLAND REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Maui, Molokai, Lanai, Kahoolawe, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Conditions will be favorable for the development of heavy showers today with a chance of thunderstorms.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kohala
